game.title: Echoes of the Lost City
game.objective: Find the lost city of Atlantis and uncover its hidden secrets.
game.description: Legends speak of a hidden underwater city full of ancient artifacts and treasures. Embark on a journey to discover the truth behind these tales and uncover the secrets of Atlantis.
game.reward: The Lost City's Treasures (unique artifacts, wealth, knowledge).

task.objective: Decipher the ancient manuscript and locate the lost city's coordinates.
task.description: Professor Croft has entrusted you with an ancient manuscript believed to hold clues to Atlantis' location. Decipher the symbols and unravel the secrets it holds.
task.location: Hidden Library of the Ancient Order, Willowbrook.

task.objective: Assemble a team of skilled adventurers for the expedition.
task.description: Gather a diverse group of individuals with expertise in archaeology, diving, navigation, and combat. Each member's unique skills will be essential in overcoming the challenges that lie ahead.

task.objective: Acquire the necessary equipment and supplies for the journey.
task.description: Secure diving gear, underwater navigation devices, and specialized equipment for exploring ancient ruins. Prepare for the challenges of the deep sea and uncharted territories.

task.objective: Navigate treacherous waters and locate the lost city.
task.description: Embark on a perilous voyage across the vast ocean. Utilize your navigational skills and advanced technology to find the hidden underwater entrance to Atlantis.

task.objective: Explore the ruins of Atlantis and unravel its mysteries.
task.description: Dive into the depths and explore the remnants of a once-great civilization. Discover hidden chambers, decipher ancient texts, and uncover the secrets that lie within.

task.objective: Recover the Lost Artifact of Power and return it to its rightful place.
task.description: Legends speak of an artifact of immense power hidden within the depths of Atlantis. Retrieve this ancient relic and restore it to its rightful place, bringing balance to the world.
